# alignment-hive

Shared infrastructure for alignment researchers. [MATS](https://www.matsprogram.org/) scholars are the first intended users, but this is built for the broader AI safety community.

Large orgs benefit from shared tooling and accumulated knowledge across their agents. This project aims to bring some of those advantages to independent researchers:

- **Plugin marketplace** - Curated Claude Code plugins with skills for common research workflows
- **hive-mind** - A system for sharing session learnings across the community (in development)

## Installation

Add the marketplace to Claude Code:
```
/plugin marketplace add Crazytieguy/alignment-hive
```

Enable auto-update to get new plugins and updates automatically:
1. Run `/plugin`
2. Go to the **Marketplaces** tab
3. Select **alignment-hive**
4. Select **Enable auto-update**

Install the mats plugin (recommended for MATS scholars):
```
/plugin install mats@alignment-hive
```

The mats plugin includes:
- **project-setup** - Guidance for starting new projects with good architecture decisions
- **fellow-handbook** - Quick lookup of MATS policies, compute access, housing, and program logistics

## Contributing

The [plugin-dev](https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code-plugins) plugin auto-installs when you clone this repo, so Claude can help with plugin development.

Feedback and suggestions welcome—open an issue, send a Slack DM, or reach out however works for you. All changes go through PR review.

## Roadmap

See [docs/roadmap.md](docs/roadmap.md) for what's planned.

# hive-mind

A system for sharing learnings from Claude Code sessions across the alignment research community.

## Directory Structure

```
hive-mind/
├── src/
│   ├── cli/      # CLI commands (share, browse, list)
│   ├── web/      # Express web app for browsing learnings
│   └── types.ts  # Shared type definitions
└── package.json  # Node.js dependencies
```

## Development

```bash
cd hive-mind
npm install
npm run build
npm run dev  # Run CLI in development
```

## Architecture

- **CLI**: TypeScript CLI for sharing/browsing learnings
- **Web**: Express app for web-based browsing
- **Storage**: Currently file-based; will move to server-based storage

## Plugin Distribution

The built CLI binary is copied to `plugins/hive-mind/` for distribution via the marketplace. See `plugins/hive-mind/plugin.json` for the plugin configuration.

import { Command } from "commander";

const program = new Command();

program.name("hive-mind").description("Share and discover session learnings");

program
  .command("share")
  .description("Share a learning from this session")
  .argument("<title>", "Title of the learning")
  .argument("<content>", "Content of the learning")
  .option("-t, --tags <tags>", "Comma-separated tags")
  .action(async (title: string, content: string, options: { tags?: string }) => {
    const tags = options.tags?.split(",").map((t: string) => t.trim()) || [];
    console.log(`Sharing: ${title}`);
    console.log(`Content: ${content}`);
    console.log(`Tags: ${tags.join(", ") || "none"}`);
    console.log("\n[Storage not yet implemented]");
  });

program
  .command("list")
  .description("List recent learnings")
  .option("-n, --limit <number>", "Number of learnings to show", "10")
  .action(async (options: { limit: string }) => {
    console.log(`Listing ${options.limit} recent learnings...`);
    console.log("\n[Storage not yet implemented]");
  });

program
  .command("browse")
  .description("Open web interface to browse learnings")
  .action(async () => {
    console.log("Opening web interface...");
    console.log("\n[Web server not yet implemented]");
  });

export { program };

## Codebase Summary: alignment-hive

**Purpose**: Shared infrastructure for AI alignment researchers, primarily targeting MATS (ML Alignment Theory Scholars) with broader applicability to the AI safety community.

### Key Components

1. **Plugin Marketplace** (`marketplace.json`, `plugins/`)
   - A curated collection of Claude Code plugins
   - Currently contains two plugins:
     - **mats**: Skills for MATS scholars (project setup guidance, fellow handbook access)
     - **hive-mind**: CLI for sharing session learnings (in development)

2. **hive-mind System** (`hive-mind/`)
   - A TypeScript application for sharing learnings from Claude Code sessions
   - **CLI** (`src/cli/`): Commands for `share`, `list`, and `browse`
   - **Web app** (`src/web/`): Express-based web interface for browsing learnings
   - **Types** (`src/types.ts`): Defines `Learning` and `LearningInput` interfaces
   - Currently file-based storage; planned server-based storage

3. **MATS Plugin** (`plugins/mats/`)
   - **project-setup.md**: Guidance for starting new projects with good architecture
   - **fellow-handbook.md**: Quick lookup of MATS policies, compute access, housing, logistics

### Architecture

- Plugins are distributed via a marketplace that users add to Claude Code
- Auto-update mechanism for keeping plugins current (requires version bumps in `plugin.json`)
- hive-mind CLI is bundled and distributed as a plugin command

### Current Development Status (from roadmap)

**Completed:**
- Basic CLI with share/browse/list commands
- Web app proof of concept

**In Progress:**
- Distribution as Claude Code plugin
- Minimal viable server for learning storage
- Feedback mechanisms

### Critical Files for Implementation

- `/Users/yoav/projects/alignment-hive/hive-mind/src/cli/main.ts` - Core CLI logic, currently stub implementations
- `/Users/yoav/projects/alignment-hive/hive-mind/src/types.ts` - Data model definitions for learnings
- `/Users/yoav/projects/alignment-hive/plugins/hive-mind/plugin.json` - Plugin distribution configuration
- `/Users/yoav/projects/alignment-hive/marketplace.json` - Marketplace plugin registry
- `/Users/yoav/projects/alignment-hive/docs/roadmap.md` - Development priorities and future plans
